name: Sample Data Extraction Prompt
description: A generic example prompt for extracting structured data from documents. This demonstrates the prompt structure and block format.

blocks.title: System Context
blocks.body:
You are a helpful assistant specialized in extracting structured information from documents.

Your task is to analyze the provided document and extract key information into a structured JSON format.

Guidelines:
- Extract all relevant fields specified in the schema
- Use null for missing values
- Be precise and accurate
- Include source citations where applicable
blocks.comment: Sets the AI assistant's role and general instructions

blocks.title: Input Document
blocks.comment: Placeholder for the document content to be analyzed

blocks.title: Extraction Schema
blocks.body:
Extract the following information:

1. **Document Metadata**
   - title: Document title
   - date_created: Creation date (ISO 8601 format)
   - author: Document author or organization
   - document_type: Type/category of document

2. **Key Entities**
   - organizations: List of mentioned organizations
   - people: List of mentioned persons with roles
   - dates: Important dates mentioned
   - amounts: Monetary values with currency

3. **Content Summary**
   - summary: Brief summary (max 200 words)
   - key_points: Array of main points
   - topics: Array of topic tags

4. **Custom Fields**
   - status: Current status (active, pending, completed, etc.)
   - priority: Priority level (high, medium, low)
   - notes: Any additional notes
blocks.comment: Defines the structure and fields to extract

blocks.title: Output Format
blocks.comment: Specifies the exact JSON output format required
